Html:
Hello

I want to send the key press event to game running on PC using Windows Input Simulator (C# SendInput Wrapper - Simulate Keyboard and Mouse)

how to send message to that particular Game or process???

Hi samvad007,

This library just wraps the SendInput Win32 API which simply targets the active window's message loop. There are often problems with games (DirectX) and UEFI (elevation).

Other than that I don't have much help to offer. :(

Good luck!
Mike
